articles.title: 'Are you out of your minds?': Putin slams Europe over gas war as he promises to meet obligation - Daily Mail
articles.description: The leader insisted Russia has always met its obligation to supply the continent and will continue to do so as he pushed for regulators to approve to the controversial new Nord Stream 2 pipeline.
articles.content:
Vladimir Putin has accused European leaders of being 'out of their minds' as he denied withholding gas from the continent as a geopolitical 'weapon'.

articles.title: Taliban warn US, EU of refugees if Afghan sanctions continue - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Afghanistan's new Taliban government has warned US and European envoys that continued attempts to pressure them through sanctions will undermine security and could trigger a wave of economic refugees.
articles.content: Taliban efforts to stabilise Afghanistan have been undermined by international sanctions: banks are running out of cash and civil servants are going unpaidAfghanistan's new Taliban government has war… [+2478 chars]

articles.title: Kamala Harris says European settlers 'ushered in a wave of devastation for Tribal nations' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The vice president on Tuesday told the annual Congress of Native Americans that history did not adequately acknowledge the damage done to their communities by European explorers.
articles.content:
Kamala Harris has vowed to address the 'shameful past' of America's European explorers, saying they 'ushered in a wave of devastation' for Native Americans when they arrived 500 years ago.
